title: "Nell Barber: Using psychology to teach machines facial recognition"
excerpt: "Though Nell Barber wasn’t sure what her future held after graduating with a bachelor’s degree in psychology, she now uses her interest in human behavior to design systems that leverage machine learning algorithms to identify faces in a crowd."
